summary: Build a private website intended for use only by the user and their friends (restricted access).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist "members-only" illustration with a lock and subtle geometric shapes (members-only-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Small lock badge icon, simple flat style (lock-badge.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Add Internet Identity authentication and require users to sign in before accessing any protected pages.
Provide an owner-only invite/admin UI to add and remove allowed Principals (friends) and to view the current allowlist.

Add a coherent, distinct visual theme for a private members-only site and apply it consistently across the sign-in screen, unauthorized screen, and admin/invite UI (avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors).
Generate and render required static images from frontend/public/assets/generated for the private-site theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Restrict website access to only the user and invited friends (private access/authentication).
Implement backend authorization with an allowlist of approved user Principals so only the site owner and explicitly invited friends can use the app.

projectName: Private website access restricted to owner and invited friends
